project1.title: Sorting Hat
project1.description: This app sorts names from an input into one of four Hogwarts Houses.  It ueses a random number generater to assign each name to a number, and each number to a house.  Then it builds a card to display the data.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Translator
project2.description: This app will translate a select few words from Spanish, French, or Italian.  It uses a function and a for loop for each language.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Nutshell
project3.description: The Nutshell project is everything we Learned up to that point in a nutshell.  It was a group project where every one wrote one of the features.  I wrote the messages section.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Jquery, Version Control with Github, Firebase, webpack and npm.
